# dictionaries/rougail/01-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
var2:
  description: a new variable
  exists: false
  default: yes
```
# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
var1: no    # a variable
```
